I had a lot of choice of destinations to do a double degree arrangement during my last years at ECE. I decided to choose this one as it seemed to me the best opportunity to both enter the academical system, get a degree from an english speaking country and learn about machine learning.

There I went to live on the campus in what I found to be a gigantic university. My room was 10sq meters large and with only a small window showing an empty field. I cried for 10mn straight when I arrived. Coming back from a crazy internship, some conferences in Lausanne and a life in Parisâ€¦ it was different.

But I knew that everything was in my head and that if I would to put things in order and create a nice environment, I may be happy, ğŸ˜ƒ. There I put the distraction away, far away and I was left with myself and a will to learn.

I took courses and even 2 additional ones (out of curiosity). I got books, ğŸ“– at the library and set in order a daily planning that filled my day entirely.
